com.opencredo.concourse.mapping.events.methods.dispatching

Class DispatchingEventReplayer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencredo.concourse.mapping.events.methods.dispatching.DispatchingEventReplayer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the event-emitter interface that the handlers must implement.

    public final class DispatchingEventReplayer<T>
extends Object
    Wraps an EventReplayer and dispatches replayed events to suitable handlers.
